name: NSConstraintConflict
desc: An encapsulation of conflicts that occur during an attempt to save a managed object.

items.name: init(constraint: [String], database: NSManagedObject?, databaseSnapshot: [AnyHashable : Any]?, conflicting: [NSManagedObject], conflictingSnapshots: [Any])
var conflictingObjects: [NSManagedObject]
items.desc: The managed objects that are in conflict.

items.name: var conflictingSnapshots: [[AnyHashable : Any]]
items.desc: The original property values of objects in violation of the constraint.

items.name: var constraint: [String]
items.desc: The constraint that has been violated.

items.name: var constraintValues: [String : Any]
items.desc: The values that the conflicting objects had when the conflict was created.

items.name: var databaseObject: NSManagedObject?
items.desc: The object whose database row is using constraint values.

items.name: var databaseSnapshot: [String : Any]?
items.desc: The values currently stored in the database.
